html: No one should have to forego lifesaving screenings or any preventative treatments because of insufficient health care or finances. To Lori Smith, her husband Kenny, and all my fellow Americans battling cancer: I will not stop fighting for you.
text:
No one should have to forego lifesaving screenings or any preventative treatments because of insufficient health care or finances. 

To Lori Smith, her husband Kenny, and all my fellow Americans battling cancer: I will not stop fighting for you.

html: I refuse to let Lori's death and the thousands of cancer-related deaths go unnoticed. I cosponsored the bipartisan, life-saving Colorectal Cancer Screening Act, which would waive Medicare's cost-sharing requirement for preventative screening colonoscopies.
text: I refuse to let Lori's death and the thousands of cancer-related deaths go unnoticed. I cosponsored the bipartisan, life-saving Colorectal Cancer Screening Act, which would waive Medicare's cost-sharing requirement for preventative screening colonoscopies.

html: This BIPARTISAN bill will: expand background checks reduce firearms trafficking by prohibiting unlicensed transfers through unregulated secondary sales. aid law enforcement’s ability to trace crime guns, which depends on licensed gun dealers’ sales records
text:
This BIPARTISAN bill will:
expand background checks
reduce firearms trafficking by prohibiting unlicensed transfers through unregulated secondary sales.
aid law enforcement’s ability to trace crime guns, which depends on licensed gun dealers’ sales records

html: 12 years ago, we lost 32 young people to an act of senseless gun violence. We remember them. We honor them. We fight for their memory and for their families with action. We in Congress must enact effective gun control legislation that will curb gun violence. #VTWeRememberpic.twitter.com/dgZ3QTzIRu
text:
12 years ago, we lost 32 young people to an act of senseless gun violence. 

We remember them. 
We honor them. 
We fight for their memory and for their families with action.

We in Congress must enact effective gun control legislation that will curb gun violence. 

#VTWeRememberpic.twitter.com/dgZ3QTzIRu

html: Elevating women is not a women's issue. It is an economics issue It is a national security issue It is a human rights issue. The world advances when women are empowered. I am proud to be part of this historic class of women in Congress. Our work is just beginning. 7/7
text:
Elevating women is not a women's issue. 

It is an economics issue 
It is a national security issue 
It is a human rights issue.

The world advances when women are empowered. I am proud to be part of this historic class of women in Congress. 
Our work is just beginning. 7/7
